channel.title: Comments on: Guy Kawasaki in Utah

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Allan-
Nope, I'm still at home in Utah. I don't travel nearly as much as Matt :-)

item.title: By: Allan Young
item.dc:creator: Allan Young
item.description: Joseph - her name is Cynthia! Are you in Vegas where Matt will be speaking at the BlogWorld Expo? If you are, we should hang out.
item.content:encoded: Joseph – her name is Cynthia! Are you in Vegas where Matt will be speaking at the BlogWorld Expo? If you are, we should hang out.
